title: Avalon Organics® Intense Defense
description: Infused with fragrant notes of citrus, Intense Defense thoughtfully balances vitamin C, white tea, and lemon bioflavonoids to defend skin and support its natural renewal cycle. Fight visible signs of aging with Intense Defense.

asset.author: Avalon Organics
asset.description: Infused with fragrant notes of citrus, Intense Defense thoughtfully balances vitamin C, white tea, and lemon bioflavonoids to defend skin and support its natural renewal cycle. Fight visible signs of aging with Intense Defense. For more information on Avalon Organics® products visit: www.avalonorganics.com

transcripts: Embrace the antioxidant power of Avalon Organics intense defense. Brightens and protects skin against damaging free radicals with balancing Vitamin C, lemon bioflavonoids, and white tea. Discover deep routed beauty with Avalon Organics.
